channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM)

item.title: CVE-2021-29088|2024-08-03T21:55:12.619Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper limitation of a pathname to a restricted directory ('Path Traversal') in cgi component in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.4-25553 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2021-27647|2024-08-03T21:26:10.603Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in iscsi_snapshot_comm_core in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted web requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-26566|2024-08-03T20:26:25.445Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Insertion of sensitive information into sent data vulnerability in synorelayd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary commands via inbound QuickConnect traffic.

item.title: CVE-2021-26561|2024-08-03T20:26:25.449Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in synoagentregisterd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via syno_finder_site HTTP header.

item.title: CVE-2021-26564|2024-08-03T20:26:25.479Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in synorelayd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via an HTTP session.

item.title: CVE-2021-27646|2024-08-03T21:26:10.663Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in iscsi_snapshot_comm_core in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted web requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-26569|2024-08-03T20:26:25.555Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Race Condition within a Thread vulnerability in iscsi_snapshot_comm_core in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted web requests.

item.title: CVE-2021-26562|2024-08-03T20:26:25.470Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Out-of-bounds write vulnerability in synoagentregisterd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via syno_finder_site HTTP header.

item.title: CVE-2021-26565|2024-08-03T20:26:25.468Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in synorelayd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to obtain sensitive information via an HTTP session.

item.title: CVE-2021-26560|2024-08-03T20:26:25.473Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability in synoagentregisterd in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers via an HTTP session.

item.title: CVE-2021-29083|2024-08-03T21:55:12.656Z -- synology -- synology%20diskstation%20manager%20%28dsm%29
item.description: Improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command in SYNO.Core.Network.PPPoE in Synology DiskStation Manager (DSM) before 6.2.3-25426-3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via realname parameter.
